org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl
Class LTLPastFutureSeparator

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
      org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl.LTLPastFutureSeparator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, FormulaRewriter
public class LTLPastFutureSeparator
extends AbstractAlgorithm
implements FormulaRewriter

This class provides an adaptation of the separation of past and future operators in [Dov M. Gabbay: The Declarative Past and Imperative Future: Executable Temporal Logic for Interactive Systems. Temporal Logic in Specification 1987: 409-448]. The separation rewrites an LTL formula f as another formula g composed of pure past formulae and pure future formulae such that f and g are congruent. For simplicity, this implementation converts every formula into negation normal form.

Author:
"Ming-Hsien Tsai"
